price: Allah je njima pripremio žestoku patnju, a zaista je ružno ono što rade.
arabic: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: aʿadda al-lahu lahum ʿadhāban shadīdan innahum sāa mā kānū yaʿmalūna
